message: Let's split it fairly, 60-40 is a good starting point.
You wanted 60, I'll give you 20, now it's your turn to negotiate!
You gave me 20, now I'll give you 30. Let's meet in the middle.
You wanted 30, I'll give you 15, but I'm getting a bit greedy now
You're being greedy, but I'll give you 10% of the initial $100. You can have the rest.
You're getting desperate, I'll take almost all the money, you can have a dollar
